DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old Legally competent male female patient Advanced metastatic transitional cell carcinoma urothelium Failure prior Cisplatinumcontaining treatment Performance Status 0 1 Signed patient inform consent Missing sign patient inform consent Performance Status 2 high Life expectancy < 2 month Brain metastasis Creatinineclearance < 20 ml/min ChildPughstadium C Prothrombin time < 50 % Bilirubin > 5 x ULN Transaminases > 6 x ULN GammaGlutamyltransferase > 15 x ULN Pregnant breastfeed woman Known/suspected hypersensitivity vinflunine vincaalkaloids Recent ( within last 2 week ) current severe infection Baseline ANC < 1,500/mm3 platelet < 100,000/mm3 Patients institutionalised due court/regulatory order
